changes_from_v3.4: Added TIER_MA_ACTIVE_PRIME tier for senior/mid-career at M&A targets (9.0% conversion, 2.36x lift)
Added TIER_MA_ACTIVE tier for all advisors at M&A targets (5.4% conversion, 1.41x lift)
Added M&A exemption for large firm exclusion (>50 reps normally excluded, but M&A firms exempt)
Added M&A exemption for firm pattern exclusions (Commonwealth, Osaic, etc. - normally excluded but included when M&A active)
Created pre-built ma_eligible_advisors table (avoids BigQuery CTE scoping issues from failed V3.5.0 attempt)
M&A tiers rank between Career Clock (ranks 1-3) and Tier 1 tiers (rank 6+)
Based on Commonwealth/LPL merger analysis: 5.37% overall conversion, 9%+ for senior/mid-career
Time-sensitive signal: 60-365 day window after M&A announcement
KEY INSIGHT: Large firms normally convert poorly (0.60x baseline) but M&A creates disruption opportunity
changes_from_v3.3.3: ADDED: TIER_0A_PRIME_MOVER_DUE - Prime Mover + Career Clock timing (16.13% conversion, 5.89x lift)
ADDED: TIER_0B_SMALL_FIRM_DUE - Small Firm + Career Clock timing (15.46% conversion, 5.64x lift)
ADDED: TIER_0C_CLOCKWORK_DUE - Clockwork Due timing signal (11.76% conversion, 4.29x lift)
ADDED: TIER_NURTURE_TOO_EARLY - Advisors too early in career cycle (3.14% conversion, 1.14x lift)
FEATURE: Career Clock timing signals identify advisors 'due' to move based on predictable career patterns
KEY INSIGHT: ~20% of advisors have predictable career patterns (Clockwork) - timing signal adds 4-6x lift
METHODOLOGY: Uses tenure coefficient of variation (CV) < 0.3 to identify Clockwork advisors
PRIORITY: Career Clock tiers (0A/0B/0C) have highest priority ranking (1-3) above all other tiers
INTEGRATION: Works seamlessly with V4.2.0 Career Clock features - 96%+ of Career Clock tier leads NOT deprioritized
VALIDATION: TIER_0B validated at 33.33% conversion (12 leads) - statistically significant above baseline
changes_from_v3.3.2: ADDED: TIER_1B_PRIME_ZERO_FRICTION - Zero Friction Bleeder (S65 + Custodian + Small + Bleeding)
PERFORMANCE: 13.64% conversion (3.57x lift) - HIGHEST TIER EVER
CRITERIA: Series 65 Only + Portable Custodian (Schwab/Fidelity/Pershing) + Small Firm (≤10) + Bleeding + No CFP
PERFORMANCE: 9.09% conversion (2.38x lift) - 79% improvement over original T1G
ADDED: TIER_1G_GROWTH_STAGE for leads outside sweet spot (5.08% conversion)
DISCOVERY: Matrix effects create multiplicative lift (A×B > A + B)
KEY INSIGHT: Platform friction signals work as a SYSTEM, not individually
ANALYSIS: V3.3.3 Ultimate Matrix Analysis + Pre-Implementation Validation (January 2026)
changes_from_v3.3.1: ADDED: TIER_1G_GROWTH_STAGE_ADVISOR - Mid-career advisors at stable firms with established practices
PERFORMANCE: 7.20% conversion rate (1.88x lift vs 3.82% baseline)
SAMPLE SIZE: 125 leads (validated), 92 leads in production
KEY INSIGHT: Captures 'proactive movers' - advisors seeking platform upgrade, not crisis-driven
ZERO OVERLAP: T1G is mutually exclusive with T1A/T1B (requires stable firm vs bleeding firm)
NEW FEATURE: avg_account_size calculated from TOTAL_AUM / TOTAL_ACCOUNTS
ANALYSIS: V3.3.2 Growth Stage Hypothesis Validation (December 2025)
changes_from_v3.3.0: ADDED: Low discretionary AUM exclusion - firms with <50% discretionary AUM excluded (0.34x baseline)
ADDED: Large firm flag (>50 reps) for V4 deprioritization (0.60x baseline)
VALIDATED: Servicer title exclusions confirmed working (0.50x baseline)
NOT ADDED: Solo practitioner tier - only 0.98x lift, not significant
NOT ADDED: Rainmaker title tier - actually 0.58x lift (WORSE than producers)
EXPECTED IMPACT: Removes ~5,800 leads at 0.34x, improves pool quality by 7-10%
changes_from_v3.2.4: REMOVED: TIER_5_HEAVY_BLEEDER - Analysis showed 3.27% conversion (BELOW 3.82% baseline)
UPDATED: Firm departures now use inferred approach (START_DATE at new firm) for 60-90 days fresher signal
UPDATED: TIER_3_MODERATE_BLEEDER threshold tightened from -10 to -1 → -15 to -3
ADDED: TIER_3A_ACCELERATING_BLEEDER for firms with accelerating bleeding velocity
ADDED: bleeding_velocity field (ACCELERATING/STEADY/DECELERATING) to detect firms entering bleeding phase
RATIONALE: Heavy bleeding firms have already lost best advisors; moderate bleeding with acceleration is the optimal signal
VALIDATION: Moderate bleeding converts at 5.43% (1.42x baseline) vs heavy bleeding at 3.27% (0.86x baseline)
changes_from_v3.2.3: Added insurance exclusions: excludes leads with 'Insurance Agent' or 'Insurance' in title or firm name
Title exclusion: Added UPPER(c.TITLE_NAME) LIKE '%INSURANCE AGENT%' OR UPPER(c.TITLE_NAME) LIKE '%INSURANCE%'
Firm name exclusion: Added '%INSURANCE%' pattern to excluded_firms CTE
Expected impact: Removes insurance agents and insurance-focused firms from lead scoring and lead lists
changes_from_v3.2.2: Added PRODUCING_ADVISOR = TRUE filter to exclude non-advisors (operations, compliance, support roles)
Filter applied in lead_certifications CTE to ensure only producing advisors are included
Expected impact: Removes non-advisors who don't actively manage client assets
Note: This filter is based on FINTRX's classification of advisors who actively manage a personal book of client assets
changes_from_v3.2.1: Added TIER_1F_HV_WEALTH_BLEEDER: High-Value Wealth title holders at bleeding firms
New tier captures advisors with ownership/seniority titles (Founder, Principal, Partner, Director, etc.) combined with 'Wealth' focus
Historical validation: 266 leads, 34 conversions, 12.78% conversion rate, 3.35x lift
Added is_hv_wealth_title flag to output schema
changes_from_v3.2: Added Tier 1A: CFP holders at bleeding firms (16.44% conversion, 4.3x lift)
Added Tier 1B: Series 65 only (pure RIA) meeting Tier 1 criteria (16.48% conversion, 4.3x lift)
Updated Tier 1 conversion rate from 16.00% to 13.21% (without certification boost)
Updated baseline conversion rate from 3.21% to 3.82%
Added certification detection from CONTACT_BIO and TITLE_NAME fields
Added certification flags to output (has_cfp, has_series_65_only, has_series_7, has_cfa)
Added data-driven title exclusion logic based on analysis of 72,055 historical leads
Excludes ~8.5% of leads with near-zero historical conversion rates (0-0.5%)

Key exclusions: Financial Solutions Advisor (BofA retail), First Vice President variants (wirehouse junior), Operations roles, Paraplanner/Associate Advisor (support roles), Wholesaler titles, Compliance roles
Expected impact: Improved lead quality by removing 0% conversion title categories
changes_from_v3.1: Added firm_rep_count signal (small firms convert 3.5x better)
Split Tier 1 into 1A/1B/1C for granular prioritization

TIER_0A_PRIME_MOVER_DUE.description: Prime Mover + Career Clock timing signal - Combines T1 criteria with predictable career pattern timing

criteria.career_clock: cc_is_in_move_window = TRUE (predictable pattern, in move window)

TIER_0A_PRIME_MOVER_DUE.key_insight: Combines Prime Mover criteria (mid-career, unstable firm) with Career Clock timing signal for maximum conversion

TIER_0B_SMALL_FIRM_DUE.description: Small Firm + Career Clock timing signal - Small firm advisors who are personally 'due' to move

historical_validation.note: Small sample but statistically significant above baseline (95% CI: 6.66% - 60.01%)

criteria.career_clock: cc_is_in_move_window = TRUE (predictable pattern, in move window)

TIER_0B_SMALL_FIRM_DUE.key_insight: Small firms + Career Clock timing = highest validated conversion rate (33.33% in validation sample)

TIER_0C_CLOCKWORK_DUE.description: Clockwork Due - Any predictable advisor in their move window (rescues STANDARD leads)

criteria.career_clock: cc_is_in_move_window = TRUE (predictable pattern, in move window)

TIER_0C_CLOCKWORK_DUE.key_insight: Broadest Career Clock tier - captures any predictable advisor in move window, even if they don't meet other Prime Mover criteria

TIER_MA_ACTIVE_PRIME.description: Senior title or mid-career advisor at M&A target firm - HIGH-VALUE M&A OPPORTUNITY

historical_validation.note: Senior titles: 9.30% conversion (2.06x), Mid-career: 8.16% conversion (1.75x) - combined into PRIME tier

criteria.ma_status: HOT or ACTIVE (60-365 days since announcement)

TIER_MA_ACTIVE_PRIME.key_insight: Senior advisors have most at stake (equity, control, reputation) during M&A. Mid-career advisors (10-20yr) are established but not entrenched - optimal timing for transition.
TIER_MA_ACTIVE_PRIME.action: High priority - M&A uncertainty creates immediate opportunity window

TIER_MA_ACTIVE.description: Advisor at M&A target firm - Firm disruption creates opportunity window

historical_validation.note: Commonwealth overall: 5.37% conversion (1.41x baseline) - validates M&A signal

criteria.ma_status: HOT or ACTIVE (60-365 days since announcement)

TIER_MA_ACTIVE.key_insight: M&A creates uncertainty about future platform, compensation, culture. Advisors actively evaluate options during transition period. 'Best advisors leave first' phenomenon accelerates.
TIER_MA_ACTIVE.action: Contact during M&A window - elevated receptivity

TIER_NURTURE_TOO_EARLY.description: Nurture - Too Early - Advisors identified as predictable but too early in their career cycle

criteria.career_clock: cc_is_too_early = TRUE (predictable pattern, but not yet in move window)

TIER_NURTURE_TOO_EARLY.key_insight: Captures advisors with predictable patterns who will be valuable later - nurture now for future conversion

TIER_1A_PRIME_MOVER_CFP.description: CFP holder (book ownership signal) at bleeding firm - high conversion potential
TIER_1A_PRIME_MOVER_CFP.criteria: 1-4yr tenure, 5+yr experience, bleeding firm, CFP designation, not wirehouse

TIER_1B_PRIME_MOVER_SERIES65.description: Fee-only RIA (Series 65 only) meeting Prime Mover criteria - no broker-dealer ties (remainder after T1B_PRIME)
TIER_1B_PRIME_MOVER_SERIES65.criteria: Standard Tier 1 criteria + Series 65 only (no Series 7)

TIER_1_PRIME_MOVER.description: Mid-career advisor (1-4yr tenure, 5-15yr exp) at small/unstable firm OR very small firm (<10 reps) - without certification boost

TIER_1C_PRIME_MOVER_SMALL.description: Mid-career advisor (1-3yr tenure, 5-15yr exp) at small bleeding firm (<=50 reps)

TIER_1D_SMALL_FIRM.description: Recent joiner at very small firm (<=10 reps)

TIER_1E_PRIME_MOVER.description: Mid-career advisor at bleeding firm (original Tier 1)

TIER_1F_HV_WEALTH_BLEEDER.description: High-Value Wealth title holder at bleeding firm - NEW V3.2.2
TIER_1F_HV_WEALTH_BLEEDER.criteria: High-Value Wealth title (Wealth Manager, Director+Wealth, Senior Wealth Advisor, Founder/Principal/Partner+Wealth, etc.) + bleeding firm

TIER_1B_PRIME_ZERO_FRICTION.description: Zero Friction Bleeder - All transition barriers removed - NEW V3.3.3
TIER_1B_PRIME_ZERO_FRICTION.key_insight: Matrix effects create multiplicative lift - all three friction reducers + bleeding = 13.64% conversion

TIER_1G_ENHANCED_SWEET_SPOT.description: Growth Stage Advisor with optimal AUM sweet spot ($500K-$2M) - UPGRADED V3.3.3
TIER_1G_ENHANCED_SWEET_SPOT.key_insight: AUM sweet spot ($500K-$2M) only works with growth stage criteria - 79% improvement over outside range
TIER_1G_ENHANCED_SWEET_SPOT.zero_overlap: Mutually exclusive with T1A/T1B/T1F (requires stable firm vs bleeding firm)

TIER_1G_GROWTH_STAGE.description: Growth Stage Advisor outside AUM sweet spot - NEW V3.3.3

TIER_2_PROVEN_MOVER.description: Has changed firms 3+ times - demonstrated willingness to move

TIER_3A_ACCELERATING_BLEEDER.description: V3.3 NEW: Firm with 3-15 departures AND accelerating velocity
TIER_3A_ACCELERATING_BLEEDER.note: Estimated - to be validated after deployment
TIER_3A_ACCELERATING_BLEEDER.criteria: Moderate bleeding (3-15 departures) + accelerating velocity (bleeding just started)

TIER_3_MODERATE_BLEEDER.description: V3.3 UPDATED: Experienced advisor at firm losing 3-15 reps (was 1-10)

TIER_5_HEAVY_BLEEDER.description: Experienced advisor at firm in crisis (losing 16+ reps)
TIER_5_HEAVY_BLEEDER.note: Removed in V3.3 - converts BELOW baseline. Advisors fall to STANDARD.

certification_analysis.data_source: CONTACT_BIO and TITLE_NAME fields from ria_contacts_current
certification_analysis.note: Professional certifications are NOT in REP_LICENSES - only Series licenses

validation.note: V3.2 tier definitions need validation on training data. Update calibration table after running validation queries.

exclusion_categories.reason: Bank of America retail bankers, 0% conversion (n=476)
Support roles without client books, 0% conversion

patterns: SENIOR VICE PRESIDENT, WEALTH MANAGEMENT ADVISOR
exclusion_categories.reason: Wirehouse employees who cannot move book, 0.54% conversion (0.33x lift)
Insurance agents and insurance-focused roles/firms (V3.2.4 exclusion)
